timeline.bodyText: I assume that this is just an almost verbatim copy of the SimpleHttpResponseHandler. I wonder if the SimpleHttpResponseHandler can be reused to avoid copy-paste?
timeline.author: arhimondr

replies.bodyText:
SimpleHttpResponseHandler
implements FutureCallback<BaseResponse>
while
public class ThriftHttpResponseHandler
implements FutureCallback<ThriftResponse>
issue is that ThriftResponse doesn't implement com.facebook.presto.server.smile.BaseResponse which sits in presto-main .
We can maybe have a follow up task to move BaseResponse upto airlift and then make ThriftResponse implement BaseResponse to have similar handling.
